mapper.insert: insert into tb_warehouse_user (userId, username, password, mobile, userType, address, deleted, createTime, updateTime, userPhoto) values (#{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userphoto,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tb_warehouse_user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userType = #{usertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, userPhoto = #{userphoto,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where userId = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select userId, username, password, mobile, userType, address, deleted, createTime, updateTime, userPhoto from tb_warehouse_user where userId = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select userId, username, password, mobile, userType, address, deleted, createTime, updateTime, userPhoto from tb_warehouse_user
